responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "F19B45AA45668DB8A1672E9F43A857FE", "Unfortunately, a criminal mage has introduced his talents and charisma to the lot of them. Through guile and fear the bandits have united to become a true threat. They now call themselves the Forsaken Blades and hope to claim this land.")
name: MADD_0005A_BDA_EudoxiaAvenmoor_Phase02_6
